findings.title: High P99 Latency Detected
findings.description: P99 latency is 2,450ms, exceeding SLO threshold of 500ms by 390%
findings.recommendation: Investigate downstream database dependency - 85% of latency attributed to database calls

findings.title: Database Dependency Performance Degradation
findings.description: Downstream dependency 'payment-db.rds.amazonaws.com' showing 2,100ms average response time
findings.impact: Database is primary bottleneck for payment processing
findings.recommendation: Check database connection pool settings, query performance, and index optimization

findings.title: Elevated Error Rate on POST /payments
findings.recommendation: Review recent code deployments and check for timeout-related errors
